newsitem.title: USA: Reliv' Int'l Q1 U.S. sales were higher.
newsitem.headline: Reliv' Int'l Q1 U.S. sales were higher.

text.p: Reliv' International Inc said Monday its U.S. sales for the first quarter rose 50.4 percent to $10.5 million compared to a year ago.
The company said key factors in the improved results included improved distributor recruitment and retention, successful sales training and marketing programs and new product introductions.
Reliv' is expected to provide full results for the first quarter in a few weeks, a company spokesman told Reuters.
The company makes and distributes food products, diet management products, sports drink mixes and skin care products.
